subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The first Toyota Camry will not roll onto a racetrack in the Nextel Cup series until 2007, but fingers are pointing and teams are bracing. Toyota is already having an impact on the bottom line for every team in the Nascar garage.
snippet: The first Toyota Camry will not roll onto a racetrack in the Nextel Cup series until 2007, but fingers are pointing and teams are bracing. Toyota is already having an impact on the bottom line for every team in the Nascar garage.
